verses.roman:
prabhura kṛpāya haya mahābhāgavata
sei saba ācārya hañā tārila jagat

synonyms: prabhura kṛpāya—by the mercy of the Lord; haya—become; mahā-bhāgavata—first-class devotees; sei saba—all such persons; ācārya—teachers; hañā—becoming; tārila—liberated; jagat—the whole world.
translation: By the mercy of the Supreme Lord, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, everyone became a first-class devotee. Later they became teachers or spiritual masters and liberated the entire world.
